subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|ic}} – originally (in oracle script) the antler of a buck (at bottom), indicating a savage attack. Subsequently significantly simplified and abstracted: in seal script analyzed as {{Han compound|日|出|廾|米}}, while in current form rather {{Han compound|日|共|水}} (similar to unrelated [[異]]); compare bottom component to bottom right of [[様]].
